attributes.action: Raise all the wages including minimum and living wages 17%
attributes.background: We want the government and parliament to raise all wages to compensate for the economic crisis the United Kingdom is experiencing at this moment in time, we think people have been living in a crisis for to long and it’s time to stand up

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Raise the minimum wage across the UK and keep pace with inflation
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/731569
